bwwExcerpt: “Death Becomes Her,” a stylishly macabre Broadway musical comedy about a love/hate triangle, has much the same plot, catty repartee, and even some of the same comically gruesome special effects as the 1992 Meryl Streep/Goldie Hawn/Bruce Willis movie on which it is based....
showScoreExcerpt:
"Stylishly macabre… over-the-top but simultaneously making fun of how over-the-top it is"
